CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper May 19, 1951, pg. 5, reads: "Four Generations - Mrs. Abraham Lincoln's family from Cleveland, Ohio, came over to be with her at the celebration. Left to right: Mrs. Sarah Idell Whitson, grand-daughter; Winona Magaret, great-granddaughter; Mrs. Sarah LeCote, Mrs. Lincoln's oldest daughter, and John LeCote, grandson. In the center is Mrs. Lincoln. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Sarah Idell Whitson, Winona Magaret, Mrs. Abraham Lincoln, Sarah LeCote, and John LeCote posed in Trinity AME Church with other women and men in background
